double Z50EnergyEstimator::getEstimate ( const double  size,
const double  dist,
const double  zenith = 0.872664 
) [virtual]

Energy estimator for SZA (Z ~= 50 degrees) data.

This function, which was fit to simulation data, returns the log10 of the estimated energy (log10(EstimatedEnergy))

Implements EnergyEstimator.
